lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He cautioned Congress about the political repercussions of certain moves, such as raising excise taxes on beer, cigarettes or telephone service, or raising corporate or personal income tax rates.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After returning to the United States from the economic summit in Venice earlier this month, President Reagan revived an earlier unsuccessful campaign for budget reform, calling for a constitutional amendment requiring a balanced budget and the power -- called a "line-item veto" -- to block individual items in congressional spending bills.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Miller is in Beaver Creek attending the sixth annual World Forum, a gathering of current and former government officials and business representatives discussing world economic and political issues.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He cautioned Congress about the political repercussions of certain moves, such as raising excise taxes on beer, cigarettes or telephone service, or raising corporate or personal income tax rates.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After returning to the United States from the economic summit in Venice earlier this month, President Reagan revived an earlier unsuccessful campaign for budget reform, calling for a constitutional amendment requiring a balanced budget and the power -- called a "line-item veto" -- to block individual items in congressional spending bills.
